@graph.rdfs:label: Document
@graph.rdfs:comment: A document resource representing a file with structured text content.

@graph.rdfs:label: File
@graph.rdfs:comment: A file on the filesystem that contains document content.

@graph.rdfs:label: Document Section
@graph.rdfs:comment: A logical section or chapter within a document.

@graph.rdfs:label: Document Page
@graph.rdfs:comment: A physical page within a document.

@graph.rdfs:label: Document Paragraph
@graph.rdfs:comment: A paragraph or text block within a document.

@graph.rdfs:label: Document Sentence
@graph.rdfs:comment: A sentence within a document paragraph.

@graph.rdfs:label: Image
@graph.rdfs:comment: An embedded picture, chart, or figure within the document.

@graph.rdfs:label: Table
@graph.rdfs:comment: A structured table within the document containing data.

@graph.rdfs:label: Extraction Result
@graph.rdfs:comment: Result of LLM extraction from document content.

@graph.rdfs:label: Document Reference
@graph.rdfs:comment: Specific location reference within a source document for extraction provenance.

@graph.rdfs:label: User Annotation
@graph.rdfs:comment: Human annotation or validation of extraction results.

@graph.rdfs:label: Has Section
@graph.rdfs:comment: Relates a document to its logical sections.

@graph.rdfs:label: Has Page
@graph.rdfs:comment: Relates a document to its pages.

@graph.rdfs:label: Has Paragraph
@graph.rdfs:comment: Relates a document structure to its paragraphs.

@graph.rdfs:label: Has Sentence
@graph.rdfs:comment: Relates a paragraph to its sentences.

@graph.rdfs:label: Has Image
@graph.rdfs:comment: Relates a document to its embedded images.

@graph.rdfs:label: Has Table
@graph.rdfs:comment: Relates a document to its structured tables.

@graph.rdfs:label: Has Extraction
@graph.rdfs:comment: Links a document to its LLM extraction results.

@graph.rdfs:label: References Text
@graph.rdfs:comment: Links extraction result to specific document location.

@graph.rdfs:label: Has User Annotation
@graph.rdfs:comment: Links extraction result to user validation/comments.

@graph.rdfs:label: Text Content
@graph.rdfs:comment: The actual text content of a document element.

@graph.rdfs:label: Page Number
@graph.rdfs:comment: The page number within the document.

@graph.rdfs:label: Start Position
@graph.rdfs:comment: Character start position in document.

@graph.rdfs:label: End Position
@graph.rdfs:comment: Character end position in document.

@graph.rdfs:label: Confidence Score
@graph.rdfs:comment: LLM confidence score for extraction result (0.0-1.0).

@graph.rdfs:label: Extraction Method
@graph.rdfs:comment: The LLM model/method used for extraction (e.g., 'ollama-llama3.1', 'github-gpt-4').

@graph.rdfs:label: User Comment
@graph.rdfs:comment: Human comment or correction on extraction result.

@graph.rdfs:label: Is Validated
@graph.rdfs:comment: Whether the user has validated this extraction.

@graph.rdfs:label: Created
@graph.rdfs:comment: Date and time when the resource was created.

@graph.rdfs:label: Title
@graph.rdfs:comment: The title of the document.

@graph.rdfs:label: Format
@graph.rdfs:comment: Document format (e.g., PDF, DOCX, TXT).

@graph.rdfs:label: Extent
@graph.rdfs:comment: Document size/length information.
